thread.title: Overall unfriendly and impersonable. Major disconnect from the hotel and its restaurant and bar.
thread.title_full: Overall unfriendly and impersonable. Major disconnect from the hotel and its restaurant and bar. - Review of Viceroy Central Park New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: L6205ZJmariev
title: Overall unfriendly and impersonable. Major disconnect from the hotel and its restaurant and bar.
text: Had several issues with the cleanliness of the room from used tips on the floor to a stained bathrobe. These were simple issues to fix but for whatever reason took days and multiple complaints to rectify. Had spent much time in the restaurant however only once did I have a good server. Had 3 experiences inside the rooftop bar and only once did I receive good service from one of the bartenders.
